topic: Common misconceptions in solar energy adoption and their counterarguments
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that actively seeking out and challenging my assumptions in areas I deem stable will lead to surprising insights. As a next step, I will identify three specific beliefs or knowledge areas where I feel most confident and systematically research diverse perspectives or contradictory information. This approach will help uncover unexpected findings and foster a more nuanced understanding.

metadata.trigger: What would surprise me if I found it?
